titleStmt.title: Saducismus triumphatus, or, Full and plain evidence concerning witches and apparitions in two parts : the first treating of their possibility, the second of their real existence / by Joseph Glanvil. With a letter of Dr. Henry More on the same subject and an authentick but wonderful story of certain Swedish witches done into English by Anth. Horneck.
titleStmt.author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
More, Henry, 1614-1687.
Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Collins and S. Lownds,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
